developer.name: CIIDS-Web-Page
developer.description: A web page to serve as the entry point for the CI&IDS SharePoint Online site. This application provides links to applications that perform functions for users of the CI&IDS SharePoint Online site.
developer.publisher: NAVAIR NAWCAD WOLF TW12 Combat Integration & Identification Systems Division

shortDescription.default: A web page to serve as the entry point for the CI&IDS SharePoint Online site

longDescription.default: A web page to serve as the entry point for the CI&IDS SharePoint Online site. This application provides links to applications that perform functions for users of the CI&IDS SharePoint Online site.
